title: Installation issue: gcc@4.9.4
body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install gcc@4.9.4
$ spack compiler find `spack location --install-dir gcc@4.9.4`
$ spack install mysql@5.7.26%gcc@4.9.4
```

This results in instruction errors when I try to compile other programs (in this case libiconv), which makes me wonder if the assembler also needs to be recompiled. GCC builds without error, but doesn't actually work.

### Information on your system
The system is running Scientific Linux 6 (gcc 4.4.7).  The above error does not happen if I install `devtoolset-7` through the RedHat package manager.

The output of `spack debug report` is

```
* **Spack:** 0.14.2-1182-661832a
* **Python:** 3.7.4
* **Platform:** linux-scientificfermi6-haswell
```
